Image.Title: Click to upload
Image.Description: Preferably in WebP fomat. Other image formats will be automatically converted to WebP.

Disclaimer.Title: Want to join an already existing group?
Disclaimer.Text: Contact the group owner to add you by giving them your registered email address.

Delete.Title: Are you absolutely sure want to delete?
Delete.Disclaimer: This action cannot be undone and will permanently delete group from our servers.

Error.Get403Edit: You don't have access to edit this group.

Error.Create500UserGroupDatabase: User-Group relation was not created - Relation was not able to be inserted to database.

AccessManager.Description: Grant access for your family members or friends.
AccessManager.RevokeAccessTitle: Are you sure you want to revoke access?
AccessManager.RevokeAccessDisclaimer: User will lose access for this group.

Error.Create404: Cannot add access to user that is not registered yet.
Error.Create409: User already has access to this group
Error.Create500: Error when trying to add access to database.
Error.Update403: Cannot change access. User does not have access to this group yet.
Error.Revoke403: Cannot revoke access. User does not have access to this group yet.
